clustering

Class Cluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • clustering.Cluster

  • public class Cluster
extends Object
    Collection of data points that are more similar to each other than to those in other clusters. The centroid is the arithmetic mean (average) position of all the points in the cluster.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cluster(DataSet ds, Point centroid)
      Create a new cluster.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        If the cluster is finnished for the k-means algorithm.
        Returns:
        true if the cluster centroid doesn't change it two consecutive iterations.
